name: foundry-local-streaming-validation
description: Validates Foundry Local OpenAI-compatible streaming against /v1/chat/completions using raw SSE and OpenAI SDK (Copilot BYOK-style)

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=require('path');const s='src/web/public';const d='dist/web/public';fs.mkdirSync(d,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(s).forEach(f=>fs.copyFileSync(p.join(s,f),p.join(d,f)));console.log('Copied static assets to dist/web/public')"
